title: Airport Check-in
description: Complete paperless check-in at the airport kiosk
requirements: Valid boarding pass
Airport kiosk access

title: Recycle Challenge
description: Drop recyclables at designated bins and snap a photo
requirements: Recyclable items
Designated recycling bin

title: Digital Boarding Pass
description: Use mobile boarding pass instead of printed version
requirements: Mobile device with boarding pass app
Valid flight booking

title: Reusable Water Bottle
description: Refill your water bottle at airport fountains
requirements: Reusable water bottle
Access to water fountains

title: Carbon Offset Donation
description: Contribute to carbon offset program
requirements: Donation capability
Carbon offset program access
verification: QR code link to donation confirmation

title: Complete 50 Quests
description: Complete 50 quests to earn this achievement
requirements: Complete any 50 quests from weekly or in-flight categories
verification: Automatically tracked through your quest history

title: Book 15 Flights
description: Book 15 flights through the Cathay Pacific app
requirements: Book 15 flights through the Cathay Pacific mobile app

title: Eco Warrior
description: Complete 25 eco-friendly quests
requirements: Complete 25 eco-friendly or sustainability quests
verification: Tracked automatically via quest completion data

title: Frequent Flyer
description: Accumulate 100,000 miles in your account
requirements: Accumulate 100,000 total miles in your account

title: Flight Quiz
description: Answer trivia about your destination
requirements: Complete in-flight entertainment system access

title: Movie Marathon
description: Watch a full-length film on the entertainment system
requirements: Access to in-flight entertainment

title: Wellness Challenge
description: Complete in-seat stretching exercises
requirements: Follow the exercise guide on screen

title: Meal Preference Survey
description: Share feedback on sustainable meal options
requirements: Access to in-flight survey system
verification: QR code link to survey form

title: Premium Meal Order
description: Order a premium in-flight meal
requirements: Browse menu and place order through entertainment system

title: Specialty Drink
description: Order a specialty in-flight beverage
requirements: Order through entertainment system or cabin crew

title: Destination Explorer
description: Browse the interactive destination guide
requirements: Access destination guide on entertainment system

title: Duty-Free Shopping
description: Browse duty-free catalog and save favorites
requirements: Browse catalog and save at least 3 items
verification: QR code scan for saved items confirmation

title: Language Learning
description: Complete a 10-minute language lesson module
requirements: Complete language lesson module on entertainment system

title: Sleep Tracker
description: Use sleep mode for at least 2 hours
requirements: Enable sleep mode and rest for at least 2 hours

title: Culinary Adventure
description: Try a menu item you've never ordered before
requirements: Try a menu item you've never ordered before

title: Meditation Master
description: Complete a guided meditation session
requirements: Follow guided meditation audio on entertainment system

title: Sky Photography
description: Capture and share a window view photo
requirements: Take a window view photo and share via app

title: Travel Planner
description: Create a destination itinerary using onboard tools
requirements: Use onboard planning tools to create itinerary

title: Podcast Listener
description: Listen to a complete travel podcast episode
requirements: Listen to complete episode on entertainment system

title: Sustainability Documentary
description: Watch a documentary about environmental conservation
requirements: Watch documentary on entertainment system

title: Inflight Magazine
description: Read the digital inflight magazine
requirements: Read digital magazine content

title: Snack Order
description: Order a healthy snack from the menu
requirements: Order healthy snack option from menu

title: Coffee Connoisseur
description: Order a premium coffee or tea
requirements: Order premium coffee or tea

title: Cultural Discovery
description: Complete a destination culture quiz
requirements: Complete destination culture quiz

title: Music Therapy
description: Listen to a relaxing music playlist for 30 minutes
requirements: Listen to a relaxing music playlist for 30 minutes

title: Wi-Fi Explorer
description: Connect to inflight Wi-Fi and browse travel tips
requirements: Connect to inflight Wi-Fi service
verification: QR code verification for Wi-Fi connection

title: Flight Experience Rating
description: Rate your flight experience and provide feedback
requirements: Complete feedback form on entertainment system
verification: QR code link to rating survey

title: Hydration Hero
description: Drink at least 3 glasses of water during the flight
requirements: Request and drink at least 3 glasses of water

title: Business Reading
description: Read business or travel articles on the entertainment system
requirements: Read business or travel articles on entertainment
